# SEQ31 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 31 focuses on mark the column locations and erect the main frame

## Category
Construction

## Patterns
apl214, apl215, apl216, apl217, apl218, apl219, apl220

## Emergent Phenomena
Primary structural framework that can support the intended building form and loads

## Overview
This sequence contains 7 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
